cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7340, a bill to provide for congressional oversight of certain sanctions imposed with respect to the Russian Federation

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MEUSER:
H.R. 7340.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H4074]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: To provide for congressional oversight of certain sanctions imposed with respect to the Russian Federation.
